body_html:
Unfortunately, we don't have the resources to support a very large variety of platforms. As per https://www.tensorflow.org/install/ - the TensorFlow maintainers currently support only 64-bit platforms, with some limited support for 32-bit builds for ARM.

We rely on the community to support other configurations.
If you have a fix, we'd be happy to review and accept a pull request to fix the problem.

Thanks!

body:
Unfortunately, we don't have the resources to support a very large variety of platforms. As per https://www.tensorflow.org/install/ - the TensorFlow maintainers currently support only 64-bit platforms, with some limited support for 32-bit builds for ARM.

We rely on the community to support other configurations.
If you have a fix, we'd be happy to review and accept a pull request to fix the problem.

Thanks!
